DSS.title: Add labels to bug report template
Email modal does not display "close" button
Override Blacklight::System::ModalComponent to show modal "close" button

comments.body: I agree 1 is not essential.

I think the first point was introduced in https://github.com/pulibrary/DSS/pull/322/files in changing to the constraints component. From what I could tell, the "You searched for" was intended to be screen-reader only, and the component re-introduced this behavior. I think we could make it visible again by changing the classes on https://github.com/pulibrary/DSS/blob/db39167113a174767037e0d85c12e2dc7e2c59d2/app/components/dss/constraints_component.html.erb#L9

pdc_describe.title: Globus Directories have a date of 1969

comments.body: The folks from Globus confirmed that this is a known-issue (https://groups.google.com/a/globus.org/g/discuss/c/OB33LKFkzlA) and a limitation due to the way AWS S3 manages folders.

princeton_ansible.title: [ruby_s] Move bundler out of install into main

comments.body:
Thanks @kayiwa, this is great. We use `amazon.aws.ec2_instance` in the `aws_ec2.yml` playbook, which builds Globus in the cloud.

We may see failures in some of our roles or playbooks, so we might want to test on this branch for a while (always run the `aws_ec2.yml` playbook from this branch, test other playbooks on it also). Here are the changelogs for each step of this upgrade:
Ansible 5 to Ansible 6: https://github.com/ansible-community/ansible-build-data/blob/main/6/CHANGELOG-v6.rst
Ansible 6 to Ansible 7: https://github.com/ansible-community/ansible-build-data/blob/main/7/CHANGELOG-v7.rst
Ansible 7 to Ansible 8: looks to be still in progress - https://github.com/ansible-community/ansible-build-data/tree/main/8
